<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53" lineLink="#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define DEBUG&#95;TYPE &quot;lanai-lower&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Limit on number of instructions the lowered multiplication may have before a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call to the library function should be generated instead. The threshold is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// currently set to 14 as this was the smallest threshold that resulted in all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant multiplications being lowered. A threshold of 5 covered all cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// except for one multiplication which required 14 mulsi3 requires 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions (including the prologue and epilogue but excluding instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at call site). Until we can inline mulsi3, generating at most 14 instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be faster than invoking mulsi3.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="#aeba41b3f0a9b5af07d6dcfbefe801354"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;int&gt;</a> <a href="#aeba41b3f0a9b5af07d6dcfbefe801354">LanaiLowerConstantMulThreshold</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;lanai-constant-mul-threshold&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Maximum number of instruction to generate when lowering constant &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;multiplication instead of calling library function &#91;default=14&#93;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(14));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaitargetlowering/#a6243792a40ae8baf41b2b216909a81ea"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaitargetlowering/#a6243792a40ae8baf41b2b216909a81ea">LanaiTargetLowering::LanaiTargetLowering</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp;TM,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaisubtarget">LanaiSubtarget</a> &amp;STI)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     TargetCC, Glue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaitargetlowering/#a385d1082d1b4f28211268ff17ca418d4"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaitargetlowering/#a385d1082d1b4f28211268ff17ca418d4">LanaiTargetLowering::LowerMUL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getValueType(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VT != MVT::i32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantsdnode">ConstantSDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getOperand(1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t MulAmt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;getSExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int32&#95;t HighestOne = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t NonzeroEntries = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SignedDigit&#91;32&#93; = &#123;0&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert to non-adjacent form (NAF) signed-digit representation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NAF is a signed-digit form where no adjacent digits are non-zero. It is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// minimal Hamming weight representation of a number (on average 1/3 of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// digits will be non-zero vs 1/2 for regular binary representation). And as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the non-zero digits will be the only digits contributing to the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// count, this is desirable. The next loop converts it to NAF (following the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// approach in &#39;Guide to Elliptic Curve Cryptography&#39; &#91;ISBN: 038795273X&#93;) by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// choosing the non-zero coefficients such that the resulting quotient is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// divisible by 2 which will cause the next coefficient to be zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t E = std::abs(MulAmt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> S = (MulAmt &lt; 0 ? -1 : 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (E &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ZI = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (E % 2 == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ZI = 2 - (E % 4);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ZI != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++NonzeroEntries;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SignedDigit&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = S &#42; ZI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SignedDigit&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">      HighestOne = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">    E = (E - ZI) / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute number of instructions required. Due to differences in lowering</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between the different processors this count is not exact.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start by assuming a shift and a add/sub for every non-zero entry (hence</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// every non-zero entry requires 1 shift and 1 add/sub except for the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entry).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int32&#95;t InstrRequired = 2 &#42; NonzeroEntries - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Correct possible over-adding due to shift by 0 (which is not emitted).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::abs(MulAmt) % 2 == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">    --InstrRequired;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return if the form generated would exceed the instruction threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InstrRequired &gt; <a href="#aeba41b3f0a9b5af07d6dcfbefe801354">LanaiLowerConstantMulThreshold</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> V = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize the running sum. Set the running sum to the maximal shifted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// positive value (i.e., largest i such that zi == 1 and MulAmt has V&lt;&lt;i as a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// term NAF).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HighestOne == -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Res = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a7d26e2f2179b5a8a53381f8046e9d117">getConstant</a>(0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Res = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, VT, V,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a7d26e2f2179b5a8a53381f8046e9d117">getConstant</a>(HighestOne, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SignedDigit&#91;HighestOne&#93; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assemble multiplication from shift, add, sub using NAF form and running</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; std::size(SignedDigit); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SignedDigit&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shifted multiplicand (v&lt;&lt;i).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Subtract the dynamic size from the actual stack size to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// obtain the new stack size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Sub = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9fa617e5567c3c2638938f7b9ddc3f1c">ISD::SUB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32, StackPointer, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For Lanai, the outgoing memory arguments area should be on top of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alloca area on the stack i.e., the outgoing memory arguments should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at a lower address than the alloca area. Move the alloca area down the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack by adding back the space reserved for outgoing arguments to SP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We do not know what the size of the outgoing args is at this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So, we add a pseudo instruction ADJDYNALLOC that will adjust the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack pointer. We replace this instruction with on that has the correct,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// known offset in emitPrologue().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> ArgAdjust = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lanaiisd/#ad25278ac9629652c1209f174c6e452c5aa3913d4b5d42464ad035b5527e59c7a7">LanaiISD::ADJDYNALLOC</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32, Sub);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Sub result contains the new stack start address, so it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be placed in the stack pointer register.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   LoBitsForHi = (ShAmt == 0) ? 0 : (ShOpLo &gt;&gt; (32-ShAmt))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   return (Hi &lt;&lt; 32) | Lo;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> ShAmt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getOperand(2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Performs the following for a &gt;&gt; b:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   unsigned r&#95;high = a&#95;high &gt;&gt; b;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r&#95;high = (32 - b &lt;= 0) ? 0 : r&#95;high;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   unsigned r&#95;low = a&#95;low &gt;&gt; b;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r&#95;low = (32 - b &lt;= 0) ? r&#95;high : r&#95;low;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r&#95;low = (b == 0) ? r&#95;low : r&#95;low | (a&#95;high &lt;&lt; (32 - b));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   return (unsigned long long)r&#95;high &lt;&lt; 32 | r&#95;low;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: This takes advantage of Lanai&#39;s shift behavior to avoid needing to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mask the shift amount.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Zero = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a7d26e2f2179b5a8a53381f8046e9d117">getConstant</a>(0, dl, MVT::i32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> NegatedPlus32 = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper function that checks if N is a null or all ones constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321" lineLink="#a0cfad667c937a3bb6922389aea511897"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armisellowering-cpp/#a0cfad667c937a3bb6922389aea511897">isZeroOrAllOnes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af14335020a68db7b9f722810e4a05180a421c6b20238e6e6585270538188f15b9">AllOnes</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af14335020a68db7b9f722810e4a05180a421c6b20238e6e6585270538188f15b9">AllOnes</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af8b512107b41f4ccaf001e31218135c3">isAllOnesConstant</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a86775f3d85d98a31b2751e1eb348ea">isNullConstant</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if N is conditionally 0 or all ones.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detects these expressions where cc is an i1 value:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (select cc 0, y)   &#91;AllOnes=0&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (select cc y, 0)   &#91;AllOnes=0&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (zext cc)          &#91;AllOnes=0&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (sext cc)          &#91;AllOnes=0/1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (select cc -1, y)  &#91;AllOnes=1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (select cc y, -1)  &#91;AllOnes=1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; AllOnes determines whether to check for an all zero (AllOnes false) or an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   all ones operand (AllOnes true).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Invert is set when N is the all zero/ones constant when CC is false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; OtherOp is set to the alternative value of N.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, for (select cc X, Y) and AllOnes = 0 if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; X = 0, Invert = False and OtherOp = Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Y = 0, Invert = True and OtherOp = X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343" lineLink="#a98baa5c6ddd157ab0823fc3c308b94da"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armisellowering-cpp/#a98baa5c6ddd157ab0823fc3c308b94da">isConditionalZeroOrAllOnes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af14335020a68db7b9f722810e4a05180a421c6b20238e6e6585270538188f15b9">AllOnes</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Invert, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;OtherOp,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOpcode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a78d0f198115bfe3331ab7cfcf7a40a97">ISD::SELECT</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> N1 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> N2 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armisellowering-cpp/#a0cfad667c937a3bb6922389aea511897">isZeroOrAllOnes</a>(N1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af14335020a68db7b9f722810e4a05180a421c6b20238e6e6585270538188f15b9">AllOnes</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Invert = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OtherOp = N2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armisellowering-cpp/#a0cfad667c937a3bb6922389aea511897">isZeroOrAllOnes</a>(N2, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af14335020a68db7b9f722810e4a05180a421c6b20238e6e6585270538188f15b9">AllOnes</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Invert = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OtherOp = N1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a93fdf85eff945f1a668b4915a051453e">ISD::ZERO&#95;EXTEND</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (zext cc) can never be the all ones value.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a>.getValueType() != MVT::i1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Combine a constant select operand into its use:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (add (select cc, 0, c), x)  -&gt; (select cc, x, (add, x, c))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (sub x, (select cc, 0, c))  -&gt; (select cc, x, (sub, x, c))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (and (select cc, -1, c), x) -&gt; (select cc, x, (and, x, c))  &#91;AllOnes=1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (or  (select cc, 0, c), x)  -&gt; (select cc, x, (or, x, c))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (xor (select cc, 0, c), x)  -&gt; (select cc, x, (xor, x, c))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The transform is rejected if the select doesn&#39;t have a constant operand that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is null, or all ones when AllOnes is set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also recognize sext/zext from i1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (add (zext cc), x) -&gt; (select cc (add x, 1), x)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (add (sext cc), x) -&gt; (select cc (add x, -1), x)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These transformations eventually create predicated instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413" lineLink="#a25b57e6a9269a29cbf98949ef2154842"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armisellowering-cpp/#ac23333bf0c5078b2f08c8e6e8509f0aa">combineSelectAndUse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Slct, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> OtherOp,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetlowering/dagcombinerinfo">TargetLowering::DAGCombinerInfo</a> &amp;DCI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af14335020a68db7b9f722810e4a05180a421c6b20238e6e6585270538188f15b9">AllOnes</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG = DCI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetlowering/dagcombinerinfo/#acf37bd7e831bdb2a5c9da8d63f843101">DAG</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getValueType(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> NonConstantVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> CCOp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SwapSelectOps;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armisellowering-cpp/#a98baa5c6ddd157ab0823fc3c308b94da">isConditionalZeroOrAllOnes</a>(Slct.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af14335020a68db7b9f722810e4a05180a421c6b20238e6e6585270538188f15b9">AllOnes</a>, CCOp, SwapSelectOps,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  NonConstantVal, DAG))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Slct is now know to be the desired identity constant when CC is true.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unless SwapSelectOps says CC should be false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SwapSelectOps)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(TrueVal, FalseVal);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PerformSUBCombine - Target-specific dag combine xforms for ISD::SUB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452" lineLink="#acaa7667e3eb47c2528ee28df06d25ee1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armisellowering-cpp/#a111643e86a00d697a134123e45817e14">PerformSUBCombine</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>,</span></CodeLine>
